scripts.theme: git submodule init && git submodule update
scripts.deploycontent: aws s3 sync public/ s3://${S3_BUCKET_NAME}/ --delete --cache-control "max-age=3600, public" --exclude "*" --include "*.html" --include "*.xml"
scripts.deploytemplates: aws s3 sync templates/ s3://${S3_BUCKET_NAME}/templates/${CODEBUILD_GIT_CLEAN_BRANCH}/ --delete --acl public-read --cache-control "max-age=86400, public"
scripts.deployothers: aws s3 sync public/ s3://${S3_BUCKET_NAME}/ --delete --cache-control "max-age=86400, public" --exclude "*.html" --exclude "*.xml"
